attributes.action: Stop media having so much free will in what they publish. alot is scaremongering
attributes.additional_details: To put a law against what all media, papers etc are aloud to post, publish, share etc.
attributes.background: Stop all papers and media being aloud to share and publishing things anywhere that you can are not factual, harm others (mental wellbeing) or anything else like scaremongering with covid e.c.t

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Introduce statutory regulation of the media: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326466

To create a public inquiry into the media reporting and presenting of the virus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318334
